sentences.en: A hawker of small wares , as on the streets or at a carnival.
sentences.cn: 我在马德里的时候正赶上狂欢节.

sentences.en: Gated apartment complexes are the hawker’s enemy. So, too, are the air-conditioners that drown out sales calls and keep residents inside.
sentences.cn: 紧闭大门的住宅小区是小贩们的敌人，同样，空调机也是，它们阻隔了叫卖声，并使居民呆在屋里面。

sentences.en: Hawker Typhoon being rearmed at a forward airfield.
sentences.cn: 台风正在重新武装起来,小贩在前进机场.

sentences.en: I am not a holder of any valid hawker licence.
sentences.cn: 本人并不是任何有效小贩牌照持有人.

sentences.en: One who travels about selling wares for a living; a hawker.
sentences.cn: 兜售小贩以挨街叫卖货物为生的人; 沿街小贩.

sentences.en: Sam: Sir, My grandpa was a street hawker, my father is a teacher.
sentences.cn: 萨姆: 先生, 我祖父是街头小贩, 我爸爸是老师.

sentences.en: Serangoon Garden Market offers a great variety of the best local hawker fares.
sentences.cn: 在实龙岗花园市场可找到多种美味的经济小食.

sentences.en: The hawker cried his wares throughout the town.
The tiny Royal Jordanian Air Force consisted of only 24 UK Hawker Hunter fighters.
sentences.cn: 弱小的约旦皇家空军只有24架英国霍克猎人战斗机.

sentences.en: VIRTUAL GORGING This site helps you make the most of Singapore's famous hawker food.
sentences.cn: 虚拟大餐这一网站能帮助了解新加坡的大多数著名小吃.

words.tran_cn: 鹰；鹰派成员；掠夺他人的人
袭击；翱翔；攫取（hawk的现在分词）
清嗓；咳嗽；像鹰一般地袭击
兜售，沿街叫卖；捕捉；咳出

trans.tran_en: someone who carries goods from place to place and tries to sell them
